act:
532682 THE CARDAMOM ACT, 1965
ACT NO. 42 OF 1965 [ 9th December, 1965.]
An Act to provide for the development under the control of the Union of the cardamom industry.
Be it enacted by Parliament in the Sixteenth Year of the Republic of India as follows:--
CHAP
PRELIMINARY
CHAPTER I
PRELIMINARY
1140060 1 Short title, extent and commencement.
30299 1This Act may be called the Cardamom Act, 1965.
1080728 2It extends to the whole of India: Provided that it shall not apply to the State of Jammu and Kashmir except to the extent to which the provisions of this Act relate to the control of export of cardamom from India and import thereof into India.
1204190 3It shall come into force on such date 1 as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint: Provided that different dates may be appointed for different provisions of this Act.
1103286 2Declaration as to expediency of control by the Union. It is hereby declared that it is expedient in the public interest that the Union should take under its control the cardamom industry. 2
1140060 1Sections 14 and 15 came into force on 1. 4. 1966: vide Notifn. No. G. S. R. 380, dt. 5. 3. 1966, Gaz. of India, Pt. II, Sec. 3 (i), p. 428.
1140060 1Chapter III shall come into force on 12. 7. 1966: vide Notifn. No. S. O. 2166, dt. 12. 7. 66, Gaz. of India, Pt. II, Sec. 3 (ii), p. 2108. 999999 1The provisions of this Act, except Chapter III, came into force on the 5th April, 1966, vide Notification No. G. S. R. 543, dated the 5th April, 1966, Gazette of India, Part II, Sec. 3 (i), p. 619. 2. Repealed by Act 10 of 1986, s. 42 (w. e. f. 26. 2. 1987).
